I like the bearing! Who invented that?

> 
> I like the bearing! Who invented that?

The main idea come from [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121800-Kerbal-Electric-animated-Turbofan-engines-New-Low-bypass-KT-8D-jet-engine-%21?p=1948486&viewfull=1#post1948486) & i don't know why but i see a great potential for tank turret & i begin my AMX-Serie ! Easy turret move at the cost of far not very well aesthetic ! The size mechanics make replica harder & contain on part plug , require an "empty" space to work properly ! That's why i probably never have a great aesthetic tank like 'Zekes' with this construction trick !

I'had to choose within aesthetic & easy to use , as a fun builder i choose "easy to use" ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Yeah, my tank chassis isn't built for good looks either (but for survivability in war games).
